description: Generate personas for testing and prototyping. Build from your connected accounts or custom guidance to mirror real-world behavior. Export in multiple formats for easy sharing and integration.

capabilities.name: persona.generate_mock
capabilities.description: Generate mock persona for testing with optional custom instructions

capabilities.name: persona.generate_from_accounts
capabilities.description: Generate persona from connected accounts (Google, GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter)

capabilities.name: persona.get
capabilities.description: Get persona by user ID or persona ID

capabilities.name: persona.update_field
capabilities.description: Update a specific field in the persona (creates new version)

capabilities.name: persona.get_history
capabilities.description: Get version history for a persona

capabilities.name: persona.rollback
capabilities.description: Rollback persona to a previous version

capabilities.name: persona.export
capabilities.description: Export persona in different formats (JSON, YAML, LLM prompt)
